full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUGS RJE CHEN PO RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO'I BSNYEN SGRUB SPRAGS MA'I 'DON BSGRIGS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI YANG 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS BRIS PA'O,, ,,) ` RGYAL KUN THUGS RJE GCIG BSDUS SPYAN RAS GZIGS, ,RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO'I RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTEN NAS, ,MCHOG THUN DNGOS GRUB SGRUB PA'I THABS TSUL MCHOG ,LHA NI DBANG BYED BCU CHA'I SBYIN SREG GI ,CHO GA 'DI NYID CHOS SBYIN SPEL SLAD DU, ,DAD GTONG PHUN TSOGS AA SGU DGE SLONG GIS, ,TSOGS BSAGS CHED DU YON GYI MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR, ,SGRUB BRTZON DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG SH'AKYA DANG, ,YIG MKHAN MKHAS PA LHA 'BUM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS, ,PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG GIS, ,'BRAL BA @005A *, ,MED PAR BRTZE BAS RJES 'DZIN CING, ,ZAB LAM RIM GNYIS RNAL 'BYOR MTHAR PHYIN TE, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB NAS, ,MKHA' MNYAM DRIN CAN 'GRO BA MA LUS PA, ,ZUNG 'JUG BDE CHEN MCHOG LA 'GOD PAR SHOG ,GNAS SKABS SU LANG DAM CHOS SGRUB PA'I BGEGS, ,PHYI NANG 'GAL RKYEN ZHI ZHING MTHUN PA'I RKYEN, ,TSE BSOD STOBS 'BYOR LEGS TSOGS YON TAN KUN, ,YAR NGO'I ZLA BA LTA BUR GONG 'PHEL SHOG ,(CES PAR BYANG SMON TSIG 'DI 'DRA DGOS ZHES PAR BSKRUN PA PO GONG SMOS RNAMS KYI THUGS BZHED LTAR ^BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,) BSNYEN SGRUB SPRAGS MA'I SKABS SU YIG DRUG LA MANDRA SID DHI BTAGS NAS GRANGS GSOG BYAS PAS CHOG GSUNGS SO, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO,
